stanza.line: So shall I live supposing thou art truetrue

May still seem love to me though altered newnew
Thy looks with me thy heart in other placeplace
For there can live no hatred in thine eyeeye
Therefore in that I cannot know thy changechange
In many looks the false heart historyhistory

But heaven in thy creation did decreedecree
That in thy face sweet love should ever dwelldwell
